title: AI: Agents, Prompting, Ethics & Tools
narration: Aaj hum artificial intelligence yaani AI ke baare mein baat karenge. Hum AI agents prompting techniques AI ethics aur kuch useful AI tools ko explore karenge. Toh chaliye shuru karte hain

title: What is AI?
content:
Artificial Intelligence (AI) is the simulation of human intelligence in machines.
AI aims to enable computers to think, learn, and act like humans.
It involves developing algorithms and models that allow machines to perform tasks that typically require human intelligence.
narration: Artificial intelligence ka matlab hai machines mein insaani intelligence ko simulate karna. AI ka goal hai computers ko sochna seekhna aur insaano ki tarah act karna sikhana. Ismein aise algorithms aur models develop karna shaamil hai jo machines ko aise tasks karne mein madad karte hain jinke liye aam taur par insaani intelligence ki zaroorat hoti hai.

title: AI Agents & Prompting
content:
**AI Agents**
Software entities that perceive their environment.
Make decisions and take actions to achieve specific goals.
Examples: Chatbots, recommendation systems, autonomous vehicles.
**Prompting**
Providing specific instructions or questions to guide AI models.
Influences the output and behavior of AI systems.
Effective prompting is crucial for desired results.
image_desc: AI agent interacting with user. Type: illustration
narration: AI agents software entities hote hain jo apne environment ko perceive karte hain. Yeh agents decisions lete hain aur specific goals ko achieve karne ke liye actions lete hain. Chatbots recommendation systems aur autonomous vehicles AI agents ke kuch examples hain. Prompting ka matlab hai AI models ko guide karne ke liye specific instructions ya questions provide karna. Yeh AI systems ke output aur behavior ko influence karta hai. Desired results ke liye effective prompting bahut zaroori hai.

title: AI Ethics
content:
Addressing ethical concerns related to AI development and deployment.
Fairness, transparency, accountability, and privacy are key considerations.
Ensuring AI systems are used responsibly and do not perpetuate biases or harm individuals.
image_desc: Balancing scales representing AI ethics. Type: illustration
narration: AI ethics AI development aur deployment se related ethical concerns ko address karta hai. Fairness transparency accountability aur privacy key considerations hain. AI systems ko responsibly use karna aur yeh ensure karna zaroori hai ki woh biases ko perpetuate na karein ya individuals ko harm na pahunchayein.

title: AI Tools
content:
Machine Learning Platforms: TensorFlow, PyTorch
Natural Language Processing (NLP) Libraries: NLTK, spaCy
Cloud-based AI Services: Google AI Platform, Amazon SageMaker
Code Generation Tools: GitHub Copilot, Tabnine
image_desc: Collection of AI tools icons. Type: collage
narration: AI tools mein machine learning platforms jaise TensorFlow aur PyTorch shaamil hain. Natural Language Processing yaani NLP libraries jaise NLTK aur spaCy bhi important hain. Cloudbased AI services jaise Google AI Platform aur Amazon SageMaker bhi available hain. Code generation tools jaise GitHub Copilot aur Tabnine developers ko code likhne mein madad karte hain.

title: Conclusion
content: AI is transforming various aspects of our lives, and understanding its core concepts, ethical implications, and available tools is crucial for navigating this evolving landscape.
image_desc: Futuristic city powered by AI. Type: illustration
narration: AI humari zindagi ke kai aspects ko transform kar raha hai aur iske core concepts ethical implications aur available tools ko samajhna is evolving landscape mein navigate karne ke liye bahut zaroori hai. AI ka future bright hai lekin humein isko responsibly aur ethically develop karna hoga.
